body_html: @adngdb I can totally use the Disabled feature for the time being. I know you are super booked with other requests. If you have time to work on this, assuming the solution is not too complicated, then let's resolve this. Next Wednesday and Thursday mornings (my time) look good. Please find a slot to have a quick chat. Thank you!
